TopicTitle: Can you make the VAB larger/higher?

Articles.Content: Is there a way to make the VAB larger? I can't fit some of my rockets in it!
You can build part of it and push it into the floor and continue building on top of it. It will load all of it on the launchpad.
You can have parts of your rocket clip through the floor, but I have never needed to do that. You must be building beasts if you need more space than the VAB allows.
The Orion needs to clip like this...
I'm pretty sure the Editor Tools mod makes the VAB taller.

http://imgur.com/HsrtqHK

It is a beast. I use this to get to the moon and back. I use the 2nd to last stage in the landing and jettison it around 5km from the ground. I use the last stage to land, ascent and for transkerbal injection. I learned once I land to to retract the solar panel. Once I did an EVA and jumped off the lander I hit the solar panel and broke it. I was barely able to do a transkerbal injection and make it back. I was unable to make a mid-course correction.

In game, you cannot change the size of the VAB without undergoing a major construction project at the authorization by at least three high ranking KSC employees, only the-...I'm sorry, am I taking this too seriously?

I'm pretty sure the Editor Tools mod makes the VAB taller.

yes it does. wider too. also allows you to go through the roof from memory as well!
